phrases: Has she already mastered them both?!
She is as good as won.
I have not mastered Milky Way yet...
The winner, from Fairy Tail A...
The Grand Magic Games are really picking up steam!
was in eighth place for the qualifier, barely making it to the real games,
and then they got creamed the first day.
But even so, through Natsu's good showing,
their points rose little by little!
But with Raven Tail's pesky obstructions...
Currently, they are known as the strongest guild in Fiore.
They have got two Dragon Slayers in their ranks, Sting and Rogue.
A lot happened with Yukino, a Celestial Spirit Wizard,
Speaking of a lot happened, Raven Tail's Alexei
was revealed to be guild master Ivan!
Ivan is our master Makarov's son.
In other words, he is Laxus's son.
And Gajeel had been working as a double agent in order to investigate Raven Tail.
At last, the showdown between father and son guilds was over.
Continuing with the battle part, Wendy was up next
I hear Lamia Scale and Blue Pegasus once allied with Fairy Tail to battle Oracion Seis?
A magical celebration with a mix of old faces and new guilds,
that is the Grand Magic Games!
Let us continue with the Wendy vs. Cheria battle!
I guess you are not going to give up?
Seven years ago, I infiltrated Fairy Tail.
To some extent, I am acquainted with inside information on Fairy Tail.
You are not supposed to exist in this world.
but I have got no love for one-sided violence where the outcome is clear.
You know, you can always surrender.
The fact that I am standing here
means that I am prepared to fight for my guild!
I do not need your pity.
Until I fall and cannot move anymore,
come at me with everything you have got!
Well, now it is my turn to break out a big move!
I will make it easy on you and end this with one strike.
Do you mean to kill your opponent?!
I am answering the full strength of your feelings with my full strength!
It seems Cheria can heal herself with her magic,
but it only works on wounds.
It looks like she cannot recharge herself with energy.
She cannot heal herself with her magic,
but she can restore another person's strength.
And because of that, Cheria's magic gained too much force...
This is an incredible turn of events!
Neither side is giving any ground!
It is a clash of little fists!
Is this tenacity for the sake of their guilds?!
The match is over and it is a draw!
Cheria and Wendy both did very well.
We were lucky to get to see that.
This is the best match I have seen yet!
Even though judging them on magic alone, Cheria's level is far higher...
I am no good when it comes to battle,
but I can use a lot of support magic that will be useful to everyone.
So please do not leave me out!
That is all I hear from you.
I enjoyed it too, a little.
Hey, let us be friends, okay?
I mean, if you want me as a friend...
Answer like friends are supposed to.
For this old man, the tournament is over!
Just the third day is over.
Even though the fight's over, that sinister magic is still around?!
Then Cheria is not the source of that magic?!
And so, the third day ended.
At this point, Sabertooth is the top team with 34 points.
Below them, the order goes Fairy Tail B, A,
Perhaps I need to think a bit-k-kabo...
The source of that mysterious magic...
Even though the person who possesses that mysterious magic is right over there...
I will put him to sleep.
Right now, I am supposed to be a Fairy Tail wizard.
I cannot lay a hand on a member of the Council.
Doranbolt, what is all the commotion about?
I know you are not Mystogan.
I am trying to bask in the afterglow of that touching ending!
Alright, let us get something to eat, Happy!
We got to see a good match today.
I am sure dinner will be really good tonight.
Oh, so there you are, Mystogan-kun!
You can understand why Mystogan-kun hides his face, cannot you?
He was unlucky enough to be born with the same face as Jellal.
Perhaps you know of the world called Edolas?
I heard about it from one of my subordinates.
That world and this one are connected.
There are people who have the same faces.
That was a great match, was not it?!
So they have been hiding him...
I apologize for not knowing the circumstances.
To me, Jellal is an evil being.
If I run into him, you can bet I will report him.
Get out of here before you because Makarov any trouble.
I swear I will be gone by the time the tournament is over.
I do not want Yajima-san to lose face here,
but we will not let him get away!
That magic was like Zeref's and yet it was not his.
Because you are father and son...
I have been waiting all this time for this day!
It was all to get Lumen Histoire!
You are my son, are not you?!
All I know is he wanted it badly.
That brat will be the end of me...
He called it Fairy Tail's darkness.
Only the master of this guild has the right to know about it.
If it are not anything weird, then I will not bother looking into it.
But where did Ivan get ahold of that information?
I never imagined that Purehito would fall to the dark side.
And now, as a result of my shallow-brained selection...
It is not your fault, First Master.
Hey, hey, another battle in bathing suits!
Just before, I saw a swimsuit that was laid out in the dressing room of another guild.
Meaning a contestant went out there topless!
That is not really the reaction I was looking for...
What kind of reaction did you expect?
Or I am going to the front line!
